message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm asking for $1,500,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe the product has value, but I'm trying to be mindful of my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $1,200,000?

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer. It shows you're serious.  While I value your interest, the product's value is truly above that mark. How about we settle at $1,350,000? This reflects its worth while acknowledging your initial offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000. Can we meet at this price?
